content.prompt: To help restore a beach, sand is being added to the beach at a rate of s(t) = 65 + 24 sin(0.3t) tons per hour, where t is measured in hours since 5:00 A.M. How many tons of sand are added to the beach over the 3-hour period from 7:00 A.M. to 10:00 A.M.?

topic.text: 8.3: Using Accumulation Functions and Definite Integrals in Applied Contexts

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Apply an appropriate mathematical definition, theorem, or test.
